## Function: `getDomainTotalBiomass()`

### Purpose

Calculates total biomass (kg) scaled up to domain level.

### Usage

```{r}
#| echo: true
#| eval: false
getDomainTotalBiomass()
```

### Output

## Function: `getStratumTotalBiomass()`

### Purpose

Calculates total biomass (kg) scaled up to stratum level.

### Usage

```{r}
#| echo: true
#| eval: false
getStratumTotalBiomass()
```
